thread.title: Traffic stop leads to pursuit across OKC metro; Suspect arrested
thread.title_full: Traffic stop leads to pursuit across OKC metro; Suspect arrested

author: Addison Kliewer
title: Traffic stop leads to pursuit across OKC metro; Suspect arrested
text:
Traffic stop leads to pursuit across OKC metro; Suspect taken into custody
A traffic stop led to a pursuit across the Oklahoma City metro on Wednesday afternoon.
A traffic stop led to a pursuit across the Oklahoma City metro on Wednesday afternoon.
A traffic stop led to a pursuit across the Oklahoma City metro on Wednesday afternoon.
A traffic stop led to a pursuit across the Oklahoma City metro on Wednesday afternoon.
At about 3:15 p.m., an officer with the Midwest City Police Department approached a vehicle during a traffic stop. When the officer walked toward the vehicle, the suspect sped away, according to the Midwest City Police Department.
The officer then began chasing the suspect. The pursuit made its way into Oklahoma City, ending at Northwest 17th Street and Gatewood Avenue.
The chase ended after the officer performed a tactical vehicle intervention on the suspect's vehicle. The suspect was taken into custody, according to Midwest City police.
